## hpr2031 :: A quick intro to OBD2 with Android

 

OBD2 on eBay - https://ebay.to/23TXfAa
Carista - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.prizmos.carista
Dash - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dashlabs.dash.android
Torque Lite - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.prowl.torquefree
Torque - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=org.prowl.torque
